DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To evaluate efficiency Irritable Bowel Syndrome ( IBS ) patient treatment H1-receptor antagonist ebastine . Design : Double blind randomized placebo control trial . IBS patient receive 12-weeks treatment ebastine 20mg daily placebo ( 1:1 randomization ) . End point : End point effect treatment clinical symptom visceral hypersensitivity evaluate barostat test .
DOC.brief_title: Irritable Bowel Syndrome ( IBS ) Treatment With H1-receptor Antagonists
DOC.criteria: Irritable Bowel Syndrome ( ROME III criterion ) age 1865 year medication : antidepressant H1receptor antagonists pregnancy , breast feeding comorbidity : severe kidney and/or liver disease
